thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Excess fee complaints drive surge in 401(k) litigation - report

author: Dena Aubin
title: Excess fee complaints drive surge in 401(k) litigation - report

organizations.name: center for retirement research at boston college

text:
Employee lawsuits over 401(k) retirement plans have surged in the past two years, driven by complaints over excessive fees, according to a report released Tuesday by the Center for Retirement Research at Boston College.
Some 107 lawsuits over 401(k) plans were filed in 2016 and 2017, the highest two-year total since 2008-2009, when 168 were filed, the center said.
To read the full story on WestlawNext Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2wbyOpY
